answers.answer: I would go back to either your doctors or L&D get seen by one of then then if I wasn't satisfied by what they said I would ask for a second option it's is in your rights as a patio not ask this and I would you and your baby are previous and your worries are valid. Good luck all the best

question: Okay sooo I've been on here numerous times usually read up on all the posts n nver really commented ir asked anythn cause I forgot my password lol but anywayz...Here it goes I'm 38 wks exactly at 35wks4days I went into labor drs stopped it and was in the hospital for two days then got sent home...since then I've continued to hve contractions sum r supER painful but not consistent:/ I've been at the hospital for several false alarms!! And of course I've had the vaginal exam was told I was at 3cm then the other time I  went in I was not dilated at all!!! STRANGE huh? Then the nurse says u just hve to deal with contractions till u go into "active labor" cause at this point I'm at 37 wks:/ my last dr visit on Wednesday I was told I was showin signs of preeclampsia which I had noticed swelling n headaches but was told it was "normal"......as precaution PA told me to go to l&d if I felt dizziness, headaches etc so I did earlier today and they sent me home said I was fine!!!!... I'm so fed up alrdy one dr says one thing the other says sumthin else n I'm still in pain feeling horrible with all the wonderful NORMAL issues and no one gives me a straight answer as to wutz goin on with my body!!!!!!! I'm so exhausted just wnt to hold my bby look into his cute little face alrdy!!!!uughhh0.o.......needed to just let it out!!!!!!
title: New here.......kinda!!..need to veeeent!!!!!
